PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2005-01682005-02-10,  ,  HERITAGE,  , 
ActBroadcasting Act
PrecisAppointment of BERND CHRISTMAS of Halifax, Nova Scotia, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, in the place of Clarence LeBreton, whose term has expired.
